reg_info.act_under: Ministry of Health and Long-Term Care Act

content.content: 1. Every district health council shall obtain the approval of the Minister before it initiates any planning of the health or hospital services needs of its district. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 784, s. 1. Français
content.raw_html:
1. Every district health council shall obtain the approval of the Minister before it initiates any planning of the health or hospital services needs of its district. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 784, s. 1.

Français
